name: Lame Knights
description:
Lame knights is a game where you control a character from ancient mythologies (real or invented) and fight against other players or bots. 

You win if you can decapitate / incapacitate your foe.

Uses randomly generated maps and has 41 characters to select from. 

Your assigned character is random but before the game starts you can choose how much more / less likely different characters are.

This game is best played local multiplayer with a 2 or 3 people.
